text:
Valentin Iosifovich Gaft (; 2 September 1935 – 12 December 2020) was a Russian actor. He was awarded the People's Artist of Russia in 1984. Gaft was born in Moscow. Gaft was known for his roles in "Hello, I'm Your Aunt!", "Say a Word for the Poor Hussar" and "Forgotten Melody for a Flute".
Gaft died on 12 December 2020 in Moscow at the age of 85.
